title: San Juan National Historic Site: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Weather              Weather      Puerto Rico enjoys year round tropical climate. Winters are breeze and summers are mostly hot and humid. It rains all year long with a "dry" season in April. Temperatures range from 80's in the winter to 90's in the summer. 7 Day Forecast for San Juan Puerto Rico. Puerto Rico/Virgin Islands Radar The hurricane season starts in June and ends in November. On the longest day, June 22nd, the sun sets around 7pm. On the shortest day, December 22nd, the sun sets around 4:30pm. National Hurricane Center
